ARTIFICIAL-INTELLIGENCE.TITLE: artificial intelligence
ARTIFICIAL-INTELLIGENCE.BODY: Every one of our Security Solutions are built on Next-Gen AI. It's core is precisely built on Artificial Intelligence with capabilities never before seen.

GLOBAL-SOLUTIONS.TITLE: global solutions
GLOBAL-SOLUTIONS.BODY: We have a profound understanding & expertise central to avoid committing fraud with Automated Teller Machines.

ABOUTUS.BODY: ZigbMax Technology is a company specialized in Communication Systems applied to Electronic Security based on ESS Technology (Embedded Security System) and Smart Sensors for the Industrial Internet of Things (IioT).
ABOUTUS.LI1: It was founded in the US in 2009 and in Mexico in 2012.
ABOUTUS.LI2: The main business of our organization is OEM solutions, sales of manufacturing licenses for our products, Development of sensors with Wi-FI, Bluetooth, Lora, Lorawan, Sigfox and LTE-M1 / NB-IoT technologies (LPWAN).
ABOUTUS.LI4: Security sensors for the financial and Retail sector, specifically in solutions for ATM, Safes and Vaults. Iiot sensors for the Retail, Industrial and Hospitality sectors.
